import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; function Cart() { const item = useSelector((state)=> state.shop.cart) let total = 0; return (
{item.map((item)=>(
Items-added
{(total += item.price.slice(1, item.price.length) * 119 * item.count)}

'name'

Rs {item.price.slice(1, item.price.length) * 119}
{/* */} item : {item.count}

Total Amount: Rs {total}

))}
) } export default Cart
